title: Janmashtami
description: Janmashtami is the Annual Flagship Event of BVC witnessed by 1000's of people celebrated with the intention to foster Krishna Consciousness in the campus. The Major attractions include many cultural performances of Dance, Drama, Kirtan, Art and much more. The Campus is very beautifully decorated with dioramas & colourful paintings. The free delicious dinner prasadam is loved by all.

title: Radhastami
description: Radhastami is celebrated with great pomp and show. It marks the appearance day of Srimati Radharani. The festival features Abhishek, Kirtan, and a feast.

title: Gita Jayanti
description: Gita Jayanti marks the day Lord Krishna spoke the Bhagavad Gita to Arjuna. We organize mass recitation of Gita shlokas and distribution of Bhagavad Gitas.
